name: GetZoomMeetingReports
description:
Retrieve details of past Zoom meetings and webinars.

This tool retrieves reports on past Zoom meetings and webinars for a specified period within the past six months. It is suitable for meetings with two or more participants and requires a Pro or higher plan. Ensure proper OAuth scopes are set for access.

parameters.name: report_start_date
parameters.description: Start date for the report in 'yyyy-mm-dd' format. Ensure the date range with 'to' is within one month.

value_schema.description: Start date in 'yyyy-mm-dd' format. The date range defined by the "from" and "to" parameters should only be one month as the report includes only one month worth of data at once.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: The end date of the report in 'yyyy-mm-dd' format. The date range should be within one month of the start date and must fall within the past six months.

parameters.name: zoom_user_identifier
parameters.description: The user ID or email address to identify the user. Use 'me' for user-level apps.

value_schema.description: The user ID or email address of the user. For user-level apps, pass the `me` value.

parameters.name: number_of_records_per_page
parameters.description: The number of records to return in a single API call. Determines the page size for report data retrieval.

value_schema.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

parameters.name: pagination_token
parameters.description: Token to paginate through large result sets, expiring after 15 minutes.

value_schema.description: Use the next page token to paginate through large result sets. A next page token is returned whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. This token's expiration period is 15 minutes.

parameters.name: meeting_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of past meetings to query. Options: 'past' for all past meetings, 'pastOne' for a single past user meeting, 'pastJoined' for all past meetings the account's users hosted or joined.

value_schema.description:
The meeting type to query for: 
* `past` - All past meetings. 
* `pastOne` - A single past user meeting. 
* `pastJoined` - All past meetings the account's users hosted or joined.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Zoom Meetings API.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Start date in 'yyyy-mm-dd' format. The date range defined by the "from" and "to" parameters should only be one month as the report includes only one month worth of data at once.

value_schema.description: Start date in 'yyyy-mm-dd' format. The date range defined by the "from" and "to" parameters should only be one month as the report includes only one month worth of data at once.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

value_schema.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: Use the next page token to paginate through large result sets. A next page token is returned whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. This token's expiration period is 15 minutes.

value_schema.description: Use the next page token to paginate through large result sets. A next page token is returned whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. This token's expiration period is 15 minutes.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
The meeting type to query for: 
* `past` - All past meetings. 
* `pastOne` - A single past user meeting. 
* `pastJoined` - All past meetings the account's users hosted or joined.

value_schema.description:
The meeting type to query for: 
* `past` - All past meetings. 
* `pastOne` - A single past user meeting. 
* `pastJoined` - All past meetings the account's users hosted or joined.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The user ID or email address of the user. For user-level apps, pass the `me` value.

value_schema.description: The user ID or email address of the user. For user-level apps, pass the `me` value.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
